publications.title: Cost Effective and Energy Efficient Drip Irrigation System for IoT Enabled Smart Agriculture
publications.authors: Muhammed Fuhad C, Stenin George, Manu Elappila, Sachin Malayath Jose
publications.venue: Proceedings of the International Conference on Smart Technologies for Smart Nation (SmartTechCon 2024)
publications.abstract: This work addresses the inefficiencies in traditional smart farming methods by proposing a drip irrigation system that utilizes IoT technologies and solenoid valves to control water flow, aiming to reduce resource consumption and operational costs while optimizing crop growth.

publications.title: Automated Contactless Continuous Temperature Monitoring System for Pandemic Disease Controlling Infrastructures
publications.authors: Muhammed Fuhad C, Stenin George, Manu Elappila, Sachin Malayath Jose
publications.venue: 2023 International Conference on Recent Trends in Electronics and Communication (ICRTEC)
publications.abstract: A comprehensive IoT-based automated temperature monitoring system designed for pandemic control infrastructures, providing contactless continuous monitoring with real-time alerts and data analytics capabilities.

publications.title: A Study on Potential Integration of Generative AI and IoT with a Real-world Example of Voice Assistance Application
publications.abstract: This study explores the potential integration of Generative AI and IoT technologies, demonstrating practical applications through a voice assistance system that combines AI capabilities with IoT infrastructure.
